summary: Levels unarmed in a lightweight esp
descriptionHtml:
At last, A simple unarmed mod!!
_______________________________

Inspired by Ilseroth's Levelled Unarmed Boost Mod (I made this version because myself and others could not get his/her mod to run properly)
_______________________________

This is a simple mod that allows all new created and existing characters to gain a boost of unarmed damage as they go through the levels. This was made so that only higher level characters experience the largest boosts and it doesn't break the game at lower levels. Usually around level 23 and onwards is when characters start to specialize (warrior, mage, or thief)

Max cap at level 30; anything beyond that is approaching Dragon Ball Z levels of power.

I have tested this and it should work on both existing characters AND brand new characters.

This is the exact structure of levelling:
-----------------------------------------

Vanilla Levels (regardless of whether your level 1 or 81)
--------------
Man - 4
Argonian - 4 + 6 = 10
Khajiit - 4 + 6 + 12 = 22

Mod Bonuses to ALL races:

Level(s)   Unarmed Dmg Increase
--------   --------------------
1 to 3             1
4 to 6             2
7 to 9             3
10 to 12           4
13 to 14           5
15 to 16           6
17 to 18           7
19 to 20           8
21                 9
22                 10
23                 12
24                 14
25                 16
26                 18
27                 20
28                 22
29                 26
30                 30

-------------------------------------------
This means that a khajiit player with dragonborn installed can get his attack damage up to 86 damage per punch!!

22 base damage + 30 damage boost from mod + 34 damage boost from enchantments (ring and gauntlets) = 86
This is WITHOUT the fists of steel perk, so it can go even higher.

Thanks for Downloading!
author: DaveEscape
